text: Tokyo Kingdom, port district.
In a corner of the district where abandoned warehouses stood in rows, a strange mechanical voice was echoing.

name: Mechanical Woman
text: The-"cargo"-will-soon-arrive-at-the-port. You-lot-are-ready, yes?

name: Female Subordinate
text: There are no issues, Faust-sama. Transport vehicles and escort personnel are good to go.
The woman, who seemed to be a subordinate, pointed at the specialized transport trucks, fully loaded just as she had indicated.
Then there was the group referred to as "escort personnel." Soldier types, wannabe thugs, Orcs, and even Oni, all of whom were draped in an air of uneasiness.
They were mercenaries who had been secretly recruited in the nightlife districts. A special selection of tough guys had been assembled in order to carry out this dangerous mission.
The woman covered in machinery, who was called "Faust," looked at everything and nodded with an expressionless face.

name: Faust
text: Very-well. When-the-"cargo"-arrives, quickly-load-it-onto-the-trucks.

name: Female Subordinate
text: Understood.

name: Me
text: (Sheesh... This job might be a pain...)
As I was quietly observing the busy woman and her subordinates, my sleeve was tugged from the side.

name: Igawa Sakura
text: H-Heeee~ Fuma, what do we do? You can cut the tension with a knife...

name: Me
text: What are you talking about, Sakura, now that we've come this far? If you act suspicious, they're gonna be onto us.
Yes, Sakura and I had been chosen as members of the "escort personnel" and were standing amongst the mercenaries.

name: Sakura
text: I-I know. And if they find out that we're Taimanin... *Gulp*

name: Me
text: ...It's probably not going to end well.
Some of the people who had gathered as mercenaries might have even been involved with brutal criminal organizations that were sworn enemies of the Taimanin, such as Nomad.
In a way, we were right in the middle of a crowd of enemies. It wasn't hard to imagine what would happen if they found out that we were Taimanin.

name: Sakura
text: Scaaary♪ Fuma-kun, you'll protect the ever-so-weak Sakura-chan, won't you?

name: Me
text: I'd rather you protected me. I'm the "Diot" who can't even use Ninja Arts.

name: Sakura
text: Ah, I forgot. If you say, "Pretty please, super-cute Sakura-sama," then I can protect you♪

name: Me
text: As if! Actually, you're enjoying this situation quite a bit, aren't you?!

name: Sakura
text: Ehehe, you noticed?

name: Me
text: Sheesh... right from the start, it was you who accepted this job.

name: Sakura
text: Even you were pretty enthusiastic about it, Fuma-kun.

name: Me
text: (For crying out loud... How did it come to this...?)
It had all started with Sakura's modest, typically student-like ambitionsー
A few days ago.
Maesaki City. A smaller city not too far from Gosha Academy, and the place where we had gotten caught up in the Devildomian Wasp incident previously.

name: Me
text: Frickin' Hebiko... Demanding whatever she wants just because she got injured...

name: Me
text: Inageya's senbei are the cream of the crop!! I went out of my way to get those for her, how wasteful can she be.
I grumbled to myself while walking in front of the station.
I was here to see the injured Hebiko at the hospital. That being said, I had visited her just yesterday as well.
And when I had offered that girl the senbei, sheー

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: "Inageya's senbei are good, but right now Hebiko wants to eat something sweet!! Ice cream! Crepes! Prince melon!"
ーacted completely spoiled, so I ended up having to buy her another get-well-soon gift.

name: Me
text: But just this one time! Well, I guess she's injured, and I kind of feel bad for her since she can't go around buying things she likes...

name: Me
text: But if she has the energy to get worked up like that she should be able to head home soon. I guess I'll repay my debt while I can... hmm?

name: Sakura
text: Hmm. Knew it, this one's no good...

name: Me
text: Oh, isn't that Sakura? I mean the young Sakura who lives in my house...
From up ahead, a familiar blonde-headed beauty came walking. It was Igawa Sakura.
Normally talking about Sakura would mean Sakura-sensei, who was a teacher at Gosha Academy, but this was the young Sakura who had come from another dimension.
Due to an incident with a dimension-traveling monster, she had become unable to return to her dimension, so for the time being she was staying at my house as a freeloader.

name: Sakura
text: Hmm, more than 1000 yen, meals included...
Sakura seemed to be deep in thought and didn't even notice I was there.

name: Me
text: Sakura.

name: Sakura
text: Something I can do sitting down would be good... and with a cute uniform...

name: Me
text: Hey, Sakura! What are you doing in a place like this?

name: Sakura
text: Whaaa!?
Sakura jumped up in surprise as I called out to her.

name: Sakura
text: Fumachin!! What are you doing here!?

name: Me
text: I'm visiting Hebiko in the hospital. I'm gonna stop by the department store, get a melon, and head over... What about you?

name: Sakura
text: Oh, me? Hmm, um...
Sakura looked down slightly awkwardly.

name: Sakura
text: Actually...

name: Sakura
text: I thought I'd get a part-time job, so I was looking for one.

name: Me
text: A part-time job?

name: Me
text: What's this about a part-time job, Sakura? I lent you money, didn't I?

name: Sakura
text: Well, you did give me a little.

name: Me
text: (Ugh... that's a worrying way to phrase it...)
Coming from another dimension with no belongings, she of course had no home, money or anything else.
At present, I had told her that I would both "let you stay at the Fuma residence" and "loan you some money for personal expenses."

name: Me
text: I just hope you're grateful that you have a place to live and food to eat.

name: Sakura
text: I appreciate it, Fuma-kun! You let me stay at your place and even lent me money. Really, I'm grateful.

name: Me
text: Right? Of course you would be.
The owner of a dog that was picked up off the street has the responsibility to properly take care of itー
Was what I was thinking, but I kept my mouth shut.

name: Sakura
text: BUT!

name: Sakura
text: My allowance is too small! It's just not enough!

name: Sakura
text: Buy an ice cream from Inageya and it's gone, buy a manga magazine and it's gone, it's really a child's allowance!

name: Me
text: Ugh!? No, that's... but...
She was absolutely correct.

name: Sakura
text: You're the heir of the Fuma head family, shouldn't you have a lot of money!?

name: Me
text: Y-You see...
As Sakura said, the Fuma head family was wealthy.
But at the moment that wealth was managed strictly by our butler, Tokiko. I got my allowance from Tokiko as well.
After I had come up with her food expenses and whatnot from my meager allowance, the amount that I was able to hand over to her directly was extremely small.

name: Me
text: Nothing I can do about that... I'm still a student myself...
I recalled the frustrations of my childhood days, thinking things like, "Gaiza gets a bigger allowance than me even though he's lower in the clan hierarchy."

name: Sakura
text: That's why I'm gonna work part time! I want to buy stylish clothes and eat lots of delicious food!

name: Sakura
text: I also... somehow have to pay back the money I borrowed from you, Fuma-kun, right?

name: Me
text: I'm low on the priority ranking, I see.
She was usually mischievous, but her thinking about paying me back showed that she also had at least some sense of responsibility.

name: Sakura
text: And that's why you should help me find a part time job! You've got nothing to do anyway, right?

name: Me
text: Well, I guess you could say that.
I had been on my way to the get-well gift for Hebiko, there wasn't any particular issue with leaving that for tomorrow.

name: Me
text: But what kind of job do you plan to do?

name: Sakura
text: Hmm, let's see...

name: Sakura
text: Right, I won't budge on it being an easy job. It would be great if it pays well! Something exciting like "Woohoo, yeah!"

name: Me
text: You really think there's gonna be a job that meets those conditions...?

name: Sakura
text: There might be!
And with that we walked around looking for a job that was "easy, well-paying, and exciting"... for several hours.

name: Sakura
text: Ugh, maybe there isn't a job like that after all...

name: Me
text: That's what I told you. Let's just give up and go home, it's already completely dark.
Reality was harsh. There was just no way you'd be able to find something like an easy, well-paying part-time job.
We had spent hours wandering around the city with only our tired legs to show for it.

name: Sakura
text: I was even willing to settle for being a waitress at a restaurant that "has a cute uniform and unlimited staff meals included."

name: Me
text: You call that "settling"...?

name: Sakura
text: Then, then, what about that creepy guy's place from before?

name: Sakura
text: The one where you make big bucks just sitting around wearing... what was it, a Brazilian swimsuit or whatever... that one seems fine!

name: Me
text: No matter how you think about it that's gotta be a no-go!

name: Sakura
text: Tsk... *Sigh* Are there really no juicy jobs lying around anywhere...
Sakura muttered and let out a deep sigh. In that momentー

name: Woman
text: Oh? Are you looking for work?

name: Sakura
text: Eehh!?
Blocking our way was a suspicious-looking woman. She was pretty, but didn't look like someone with a respectable occupation. It was possible she was one of the gang members in this area.

name: Female Gangster
text: Oooh♪ Aren't you quite the cutie. It was worth it to come here for scouting♪

name: Sakura
text: S-Scouting!? If it involves Brazilian swimsuits, then I won't do it!!

name: Female Gangster
text: Ohh, even without a swimsuit, there are plenty of juicy jobs out there for a pretty girl like you.

name: Sakura
text: Really!?

name: Female Gangster
text: Really. Just follow me♪

name: Sakura
text: Woohoooo! I'm coming, I'm coming!

name: Me
text: Wait, wait, wait, Sakura!? UhーI'm asking just in case, but... this job... do you have to do indecent stuff?

name: Female Gangster
text: Ehehe♪ That's a secret♪

name: Sakura
text: Then it's okay!

name: Me
text: It's obviously not!?
I did my best to pull back Sakura, who was now totally blinded by money. Thenー

name: Gangster
text: Huuuh? What's wrong with you, brat? Did you not hear what my big sis said?

name: Me
text: Whoa!?
As I turned around after being forcefully grabbed by the shoulder, here too was a gangster-esque man threatening me with a villainous expression.

name: Sakura
text: Woah! There's someone else!!

name: Me
text: Hey, hey. You gotta be kidding me...
In front of us a gangster girl, behind us a gangster guy. Quite the troublesome situation...

name: Gangster
text: The jibber-jabber is gettin' on my nerves, big sis!! Brats like this, they'll go down with one good whack!!

name: Female Gangster
text: Ehehe♪ You're right♪ Oh, but don't punch the girl in the face♪

name: Sakura
text: Uh-oh... You don't mean, could this be... a dodgy job referral!?

name: Me
text: A little slow on the uptake there!!

name: Gangster
text: So you don't care if I mess up the guy~?
The man pointed the barrel of his handgun at me and came walking over with a grin.

name: Me
text: H-Hey?!

name: Sakura
text: What do we do, Fuma-kun?!

name: Me
text: I don't think we can avoid a fight... Fucking... sheesh!
